data.title: Best headset I have used for making professional calls or listening to podcasts or audiobooks.
data.body:
I‚Äôm happy to share my experience with the LEVN Bluetooth 5.0 Headset. I‚Äôve been using it for a while now and I must say that it‚Äôs one of the best headsets I‚Äôve ever used. The headset‚Äôs AI noise-cancelling technology is impressive and ensures that I can hear and be heard clearly, even in noisy environments. I work remotely so it is important that when I am on a conference call that the background noise be muffled. In addition to using the headset for work I use it in my personal time making calls to friends and family. The convenience of not having to hold a phone to my ear or close to my mouth to speak is invaluable. The headset‚Äôs 35-hour battery life is amazing and means that I can use the headset for several days without having to recharge it. If I ever do forget to recharge it and I need to use it, my husband bought a separate USBC cable from Amazon so I could charge it while I am on the phone. The headset is Bluetooth, so I have paired it to every device I have making it a versatile option for me. I paired it to my desktop computer, laptop, iPhone and even my Kindle Fire. It was easy and took very little time.
I, also, use the headset to listen to podcasts and audiobooks while working out. The headset‚Äôs comfortable earmuff and 270¬∞ rotatable microphone make it easy to use the headset for extended periods without experiencing discomfort. I tried both the left side and the right to find the one that was just right for me. The fact that I can use one ear to listen to my surroundings while wearing the headset is a great feature that ensures I remain aware of my surroundings while listening to my favorite artists and authors.
Overall, I would highly recommend the LEVN Bluetooth 5.0 Headset to anyone who needs a reliable and versatile headset for work, online classes, or for personal enjoyment.

data.title: You Will Never Lose Your Head phones Again
data.body:
I recently acquired the LEVN Bluetooth 5.0 Headset, and I must say that it has exceeded all my expectations. This headset is a true game-changer in the world of wireless audio devices, earning every bit of its 5-star rating.

First and foremost, the sound quality is absolutely outstanding. With the advanced Bluetooth 5.0 technology, it offers a seamless and crystal-clear audio experience. The bass is deep, the mids are crisp, and the highs are detailed. Whether I'm listening to music, watching videos, or taking calls, the audio quality is consistently top-notch.

The AI Noise Cancelling feature is a real showstopper. It effectively blocks out background noise, making phone calls and video conferences a breeze, even in noisy environments. The built-in microphone is incredibly sensitive, ensuring that my voice comes through clearly while ambient sounds are virtually non-existent to the other party.

One of the standout features of the LEVN Bluetooth Headset is the extraordinary battery life. With an impressive 35 hours of playback time on a single charge, I rarely find myself reaching for the charger. This longevity is perfect for long trips, workdays, or simply not having to worry about constantly recharging your headset.

Comfort-wise, the LEVN headset is a winner. It's lightweight, and the ergonomic design ensures that it fits snugly and securely on your head without causing discomfort during extended use. The ear cups are cushioned for extra comfort, making it a joy to wear for hours on end.

The build quality is robust, and the materials used feel premium. I appreciate the attention to detail that LEVN has put into this product, from the sleek design to the intuitive button layout and controls.

The Bluetooth pairing process is incredibly simple and quick, and it maintains a stable connection over a considerable distance. I've had no issues with disconnections or interference while using the headset.

In summary, the LEVN Bluetooth 5.0 Headset is a fantastic product that delivers on every front. It combines superb sound quality, excellent noise-cancelling capabilities, remarkable battery life, and superior comfort. Whether you're a music enthusiast, a professional needing clear communication, or simply seeking a reliable wireless headset, this product is an excellent choice. I highly recommend the LEVN Bluetooth 5.0 Headset to anyone in need of a high-quality audio companion. It has truly set the standard for wireless headsets, and I couldn't be more satisfied with my purchase. Five stars well-deserved!

data.title: Great Quality, Great Price
data.body: We have used this headset for a month now and it is performing great. I am a call center manager and always looking for great quality and a great price point. The headset fits comfortably for long periods of time, holds its charge for a full day (in a call center environment), and has great sound quality. I recommend this headset for personal or professional use.

data.title: I love this BT headset!
data.body:
I got this Bluetooth headset on sale. I was weary about all its perks because not everything you read about a product is true.

When I received the headset the packaging was simple and it came with a charging stand. The headset itself is sleek and clean looking. I charged it to full capacity and it paired effortlessly to my work computer. It has the volume button on the side of the headset a long with a mute button. This is very convenient. Wearing it is a lot more comfortable than I am used to. So it works great for long working hours. The background noise it picks up is very minor. I have 3 rowdy children! So I know It keeps the noise drowned out. I do wish the charging stand wasn‚Äôt so sensitive and it had features for answering the phone for my job using the headset, but that‚Äôs really all I can say would be a con.
I would 100% recommend this product to anyone who works from home!

data.title: The easiest wireless headset to connect!!
data.body: I bought this wireless headset since I telework and needed a simple unit that was compatible with my current PC setup. I didn't have to do much, except plug and play. My PC immediately recognized the headset. The sound quality is awesome, and the unit is light in weight and has that professional feel without breaking the bank. Thank you for such a well-engineered and well-constructed wireless headset. I highly recommend it!!

data.title: Decent headset for work at home
data.body: This headset is decent for work at home. It's comfortable over the ear and the volume for speaker is great. The range is good enough to wash dishes in the Kitchen and still recieve a ring tone to get your ass back to work. The battery seems to be holding up for decent volume incoming calls. Overall the price matches up to the product.

data.title: Good Product, Excellent Customer Commitment / Service
data.body: As I said in my original review, I had a charging issue with the original unit so I set up a return but the replacement unit I got was an "open box" so I initially gave a poor review but. The seller reached out to me and offered to and then made it right. I am back in business which is great since I spend a lot of my day in meetings and the headset is very adjustable and comfortable for me to wear for long periods of time. It also has very good sound quality and noise canceling as well as very good range (I am using the dongle). I would definitely buy from / recommend this seller again.

data.title: Great sound and comfortable
data.body: Has been working great, mostly use this for cell calls at work so wanted wireless to be able to avoid cords. It also comes with usb to attach to computer so you can go back and forth from phone to Teams/zoom calls if preferred. It‚Äôs very light and I‚Äôll forget I‚Äôm wearing it. Battery life is great and little charger looks nice on the desk! Great sound quality, I may get a second one for other office space.

data.title: ---Great for use in a room with a lot of noise.---
data.body:
I needed a new headset for my home office setup. I have four 3D printers in my office that run most of the time I am in it, so I needed something that would allow me to be on a call without interrupting my conversation with too much noise. I have been using it for over a month without issue.

The noise-canceling function is a game changer. I have been on both ends of this headset, and as a caller, you cannot hear the 3D printer noise at all. The volume gets loud enough to fill all the needs I have. I have used it for TEAMS calls, conference calls over IP, and zoom meetings, and I can say this headset is fantastic. The battery life is excellent. I have not had to stop in the middle of the day to charge the headset. I have yet to test exactly how long it will go, but it fills my day without issue.

The ear cushion is soft and has yet to leave me wanting something thicker. Build quality is on par with something more expensive. Nicely made.

As someone who used to use a Plantronics headset, I can tell you that for the money, this headset is FANTASTIC!!

data.title: Hours of comfortable video conferencing
data.body: I am so glad I purchased this headset. up until this time I had been struggling with using a wired headset and that prevented me from being able to take it with me as I was doing things around the house and be able to listen to my conference call. Having this wireless headset has allowed me to warm up my coffee or take a quick bio break without missing any important details shared in the meeting. Just make sure that you are on mute while you multitasking so that folks don‚Äôt hear the background noise. The headset is comfortable and lightweight and it doesn‚Äôt mess up my hair for those moments when I need to have my video conference on.

data.title: Great plug and play
data.body: I bought this to use at work. I work from home and my company provided wired headset, but not only does the wire get tangled, my cat chews on the cord. The company I work for won't pay for a wireless set. These work great. My only complaint is that the earpiece is a little too small and if I wear these for an extended period of time, the top of my ear starts to hurt. Other than that, I really like these.

data.title: I work remote and am on long calls
data.body: I got this headset to be able to roam home btwn calls. I love it it holds a charge well and charges quickly the sound is clear volume and mute button easy to find and use. My only negative feedback and it could be phone software employer uses is that every once in a while during a call I am told I sound robotic and that I'm cutting in and out. I hang up call them back and all is well and clear for remainder of call this usually happens once or twice in an 8 hr shift. The wireless is SO worth it though

data.title: STOPPED WORKING IN LESS THAN A MONTH..UPTADE
data.body:
I BOUGHT THIS FOR WORK, STARTED USING THIS IN FEBRUARY, CUSTOMERS ARE COMPLAINING THAT THEY CAN'T HEAR ME, WHEN IT DOES; BACKGROUND CANCELING FEATURE DOES NOT WORK. I'VE BEEN ASKING FOR HELP FROM SUPPORT SO WHERE IS IT?!

Update:
A member of staff reached out to my by the name of Fiona, she worked through helping me to solve the issue and nothing changes so she issued a replacement. She was understanding, showed empathy and made sure everything was set. Thank you Fiona! I look forward to a great experience with my headset

data.title: Working from home.
data.body: The set up was a breeze. I hate being on a leash (wired headset). I am able to get up and move through my apartment without it disconnecting. I use the headset 8 hours a day x 5, so comfort is important. It is light weight and only discomfort I have is when I am wearing my glasses the pressing on my glasses makes my ear a bit sore, but if I adjust it a few times its better. Thats just the downfall when you wear glasses. I would buy again.

data.title: Lifesaver headset!
data.body: I have a WFH job mostly on calls all day and this wireless headset is great if you need to get up for a moment and not worry if you get a call you won't be able to hear. I also have parrots and they can be very loud so sometimes they scream when I'm on a call. It's definitely noise cancelling because I've never had anyone complain!

data.title: Outstanding Customer Service
data.body:
Edit: I came back to update my review of this product. Although I did experience the issue mentioned below in my original review, the company reached out several times and really went above and beyond to stand behind their products and ensure that they could turn this into a positive experience without me even pushing the issue. Exceptional customer service is such a rare quality nowadays, so I felt compelled to make sure I made this update to give the company credit for their actions.

I really wanted to love this headset. I tried it for about 30 days and had to return it. I can say it‚Äôs super easy to setup and the speaker and microphone were crystal clear with no static or extra noise, even if you blow on the microphone (which is a habit I have to check if my mic is working, so fortunately or unfortunately, that test doesn‚Äôt work with this microphone). My issue with the headset is that the charging prongs on the standing charger don‚Äôt automatically engage with the charging port on the headset when you store the headset on the stand. I had to wiggle the headset back and forth on the stand to get it to connect with the charging prongs (you will know it‚Äôs charging because the indicator light changes color). Several times I‚Äôve wiggled it into the right position to charge and closed down my home office for the day, only to pick up the headset for a conference call the following day and be met with a message stating ‚Äúlow battery‚Äù, at which point the headset shuts itself off. Super inconvenient and caused me to fumble around for my wired headset while unable to hear coworkers on the call actively speaking to me. After a few instances of this, I decided to return it. I know the headset can be attached directly to the charging cord, but I paid extra for the charging stand to have somewhere to both store it properly AND simultaneously charge it. Otherwise I would have just bought the cheaper version with no charging stand (which I still might do, because overall the headset worked great when it was charged).

data.title: Good after 6 months.
data.body: The headset is good. I expect a headset to last for a while, and after about 6 months it is still holding up. It holds firm on my larger head, and my colleagues tell me I sound fine. However, recently I have noticed an issue where the headset will not charge when turned on and docked. Sometimes the light does turn red, sometimes not, but eventually I will hear a voice saying "Low battery, please charge" even though it is right there, on the dock. My fix has been to turn off the headset and then dock it, where it seemingly charges with no issue. But you can imagine my frustration when I go to pick it up just before getting on a call, and the battery is low. This is a recent problem so YMMV.

data.title: Fantastic so far.
data.body:
I will update if something changes but first two days using this head set for WFM with Microsoft, teams, and cloud phone system is awesome. Connection and sound are crystal clear. Battery life so far is great, have not had to charge it yet. User guide says 30 hour charge, so I will keep an eye on that and see how true the life is on one charge. It arrived with a 70% charge. The dock is secure and a great place to sit head set while not in use.

Favorite features : mute button gives a ‚Äúmute on/mute off‚Äù whisper instead of a light at the microphone.

Microphone has a pop guard soft cover.

Mic boom is very flexible and can be set in any position. Left and right ear options.

Ear cushion is nice and comfy. On hear, not over ear.

Head set is very light and stays in place well. Great for all day wear.

Over all the value is great, and I highly recommend. A perfect upgrade from my JLab that I had for a year, which was working fine until I adjusted the mic so much that I am sure I broke the wire inside. It was also heavy and two eared, so I was looking for a lighter and single ear upgrade. Only thing left to test is longevity!

data.title: Great product
data.body: This headset is amazing! I've bought several trying to find one that would do everything I need and I wish I would've found this one first. It bluetooths to the computer. I'm able to use talk to text and it clearly types everything out. I don't have to spend time making corrections. I can't say enough good things. If you're on the fence.....buy it. You won't regret it.

data.title: Great Headset for big heads ü´°
data.body: I have a big head. This headset big head approved. In all seriousness though I work in a call center where I take on average 950 calls a month which can put a lot of wear and tear on headsets. I use to go through uncomfortable and tight headsets regularly as they would break from being stretched open too far. I feel confident saying this has been the best headset i have had so far!

data.title: Great Wireless Headset
data.body: I have had this product for about a month now. Has been working great so far. I use this for calls at work so I was looking for something wireless to be able to avoid cords. It also comes with a small USB to plug into your computer and a little charging stand. It‚Äôs very light and I‚Äôll forget I‚Äôm wearing it. Battery life and sound quality is great as well.

data.title: wireless headset heaven
data.body: ive always used a wired headset for work but realized i couldnt walk freely while taking work calls. now, this is a game changer. i can mute my customers as needed and walk around to tend to my kids and dogs. mute while going to the restroom and everything. i was also surprised as the wireless distance. i was able to walk all the way to the car in the driveway and not lose signal. no way! my airpods even lose signal.

data.title: Great Customer service
data.body:
The headphones are amazing, sound quality is great and I love being able to leave my desk while on a call.
My initial headset had a malfunction with the mute
button. Reached out to customer service, got a response within an hour from Andrea and received a new headset two days later.
Will be ordering from them again.

data.title: Great Headset!
data.body: I recently started working remotely, and I needed a good headset. My company sent me a headset, but it was not comfortable and the mic did not work well. This headset is very comfortable. I love that it only covers one ear. The mic works wonderfully. I love that I can wear it on either side. The charge lasts all day. It comes with a great charging stand that sits nicely on my desk without taking much space. I highly recommend this headset.

data.title: Great Headset
data.body: I bought this headset for my brother that works in sales remotely, before he got a wired headset that make his job more difficult, he is very happy with this one as he can move around the house. The microphone is very good and has no issues with volume. I would recommend this product to others.

data.title: Free from wires!
data.body: I‚Äôve worked from home for over a decade and used various types of mic/headphone combos over the years. These are by far the best I‚Äôve had. I‚Äôm on meetings 4+ hours in a typical day. These are clear, comfortable and, of course the best feature, wireless. I love having the freedom to leave my desk while on a meeting without having to carry around my laptop like I used to do when I had a wired headset. The range on these is great, too. I also love the charging stand. Easy to use, keeps them powered up and also a great place to store them when not in use. The last thing I love is that there is only one headphone, so I can hear what‚Äôs going on in the house while on a call (door bell rings, wife comes home early, etc.). I recommend these for people frequently on video/audio calls.

data.title: Customer service
data.body: I had an issue with my first headset and informed the customer service team about the issue I was having and they sent a new headset free of charge and the new headset works great! I am able to work from home without anyone hearing my child or dogs in the background.

data.title: Love the one ear piece
data.body: I work remotely, and am on calls throughout most of the day. I really like that it only has one ear piece, and comes with a charging stand so in betweeen calls it is ready to go! The sound and mic quality is very clear. I highly recommend this headset.

data.title: These are better than others
data.body: I have tried a few and these were better than others but my ear did get sore after about 3 hours of work. I returned them. If you work from home spend the money on great quality. I will say these were the best under $100 that I've tried so if you're strapped then these are good enough. Kept their charge a long time too.

data.title: Great headset
data.body: I bought this headset when starting a remote job, to replace the one that they sent with the onboarding package. No regrets. Works great. Comfortable. Stays charge for my full shifts. Cannot ask for anything more for the price. Would recommend.

data.title: Good for college courses.
data.body: When I first got the headset, I had no clue how to set it up even with the easy to follow instructions, but that was on me not the actual headset. Once I figured out what was wrong on my end it was so easy to connect. I enjoy the fact that I can switch out from using my gaming headset to my wireless headset for my college courses. If you have childern, I recommend due to the noise canceling it has. My small human can be rambunctious when I am trying to talk to an instructor so it helps not having that pick up. It's great for the price.

data.title: The LEVN bluetooth 5.0 Headsets delivers as promised !
data.body: I purchased this product to complement our new softphone system in the office where the ambience can be quite noisy and being able to move throughout the office without losing a call is imperative. After more than two weeks of owning the LEVN 5.0 headsets, I can attest that its performance is nearly flawless. The set hold a charge for the full 8-hour workday. The fit is perfect for my head with ample flexibility to adjust its size, volume and cradle capabilities. Are there cheaper models out there? Yes. Is the purchase amount for this high-quality product worth my investment without experiencing other headset brands with poor connections, weak volume and nagging wireless headsets with a poor design? Yes.

data.title: Great Headset- Clear Sound
data.body:
I searched for several days to find a headset that met the requirements of what I was looking for. This headset has met all of this needs. I love the fact that if is wireless so I'm not tied to my desk. If I was to stand up and walk over to the printer I can do that without needing to take my headset off. The calls are clear. They can hear me clearly and I can hear them. I also like the fact that it only covers one ear. I like to have the other ear uncovered so that I can hear the things around me. The charging stand is compact and takes up very little room on my desk.

Overall I am pleased with this purchase and would highly recommend it to others.

data.title: Just what I was looking for!
data.body: Affordable and wireless. The sound is clear and my coworkers haven‚Äôt mentioned any issues with not being able to hear me or excessive background noise. Recommended to another coworker and she doesn‚Äôt have any issues with it either. I use it for the day then charge it till my next shift.

data.title: Quality sound for a great price
data.body: I love this headset! Working from home with a very active 3 year old, this headset allows for her to play right next to me while I‚Äôm on a call and there is very little background noise heard by the caller. I recommend this headset to everyone who works from home especially with little ones!!

data.title: Great headset!!!
data.body: This headset is great, not only for the price but just overall. The reach is great and it hasn‚Äôt died on me once while working from home. I would recommend this headset to anyone looking to start working from home.

data.title: WOW am I impressed with the comfort of these!
data.body: I work from home and have been searching for the perfect headseat that I can use that has comfort, battery life and distance from base. I finally have found it with my LEVN bluetooth wireless headset. It fits nicely on the head and doesnt squeeze it like some do. I can actually go from my office to the kitchen without losing connection which is great as a customer service employee who might need a coffee boost earlier than break. But best of all is the charge it keeps! I can go all day with a charge and then a few hours into the next one. Dont hesitate. get one of these, im going to buy a second pair when I can!

data.title: Leveno
data.body: Wireless headset be careful to check before your return time expires. Update I have not opened replacement yet just received but they were fast at responding and replacing my product and communication was amazing from start to finish.

data.title: Highly recommended for price and features
data.body:
I Tried 2 other hesdsets before getting this one.

Pro: Great product easy to connect and works very well. Used heavily for work from home. Overall Calls are clear no real complaints.
Price and features was what drew me to this one.

data.title: Love it!!!
data.body: I drive truck for a living so my environment can be loud. This headset is loud and everything comes through nice and clear. There are no issues with background noise and the people I talk to say I sound fine. They can't tell I'm on a headset.

data.title: Drowns out the noise
data.body: Great wireless headset! Love that I can be hands free and be able to walk around my office without being attached to a cord. Really drowns out your annoying loud peers and sounds in the office too!

data.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For
data.body:
The headset works as advertised! I needed a good quality, reasonably priced, wireless headset to use with MS Teams. Specifically one that I can use to remotely mute the microphone while in a Teams meeting. This one delivered on all counts.

I must point out that when the headset is muted Teams does not "visibly" reflect that but Teams is muted. The headset announces "mute on" & "mute off" while in a Teams meeting, so that's a great help.

Now I'm mobile & interactive. I'm elated!

data.title: I love my headset.
data.body: It‚Äôs light & easy to manage. I love the versatility in connecting. I sometimes wish I had 2 speakers but the one is decent to be more aware. I work from home late and don‚Äôt want both my ears covered all the time.

data.title: Work from home
data.body: This product is so great for working from home I have three babies and the wireless headset makes it easy to walk away from your desk but still hear every call that comes in so you can tend to other things.

data.title: Wireless headset!!
data.body: I know I need a headset but I was debating for a while about which headset to buy. I sit in front of a computer all day and attend a bunch of online meetings throughout the week. This wireless headset provided me the freedom to participate in the meetings and talk around my office without disturbing anyone during the meeting. It doesn‚Äôt cover both ears, so that a plus for me as I can still talk to other people during the meeting. It‚Äôs a great device, I loved it and use it in all my meetings.

data.title: Great quality
data.body: This headset is good and they are definitely noise cancelling but Everyday I have to reconnect it so that my team mates can hear me. I can hear them fine but they can‚Äôt hear me, and I have to do this 2/3 times a day. But other than that they are comfortable and durable.

data.title: very good quality, ear piece is comfortable, very easy to use
data.body: Love this headset brought it about 3 weeks ago and it has very good quality, ear piece is comfortable, very easy to use, noise cancelation is very good. I would recommend this product! I am actually about to order another one for my sister.

data.title: PERFECT FOR WORK!
data.body: From someone that has at least 3 or 4 online meeting, this headset is wonderful, it‚Äôs comfortable, it‚Äôs easy to set up, and portable to carry it with you if you need to go mobile. It‚Äôs pretty useful.

data.title: Best Wireless Headset
data.body: This is the best wireless headset for working from home .. when them calls started coming in slow I was able to move around and not have to think about some calling or running back and forth to the computer

data.title: Yessss I Love Them
data.body: If you‚Äôre looking for some VERY comfortable noise counseling headsets these are the perfect headsets. I would get complaints from my supervisor about the background noise and I saw a lady post about these headsets in a work from home group on Facebook. I purchased them and OMG I am NOT disappointed. I think I‚Äôll buy another pair just to have them!!!

data.title: Great headset for this price range
data.body: I've used this headset for a few weeks for work. I have multiple meetings per day (not listening to music with it). The incoming audio quality is very good. Outgoing audio is good enough (I have listened to some test calls on Teams). Connectivity to my PC is very good, including the time until connecting when turning on. Distance from my PC seems great - I can go in the kitchen and get coffee while staying connected. I'm also very happy with the battery life - it's excellent for me. It seems to do a good job of disconnecting and sleeping when not in use (to save battery). It will stay connected a while when I remove it from my head, but that does not bother me. Also, it does not make me too warm like over-ear headphones do.

data.title: Great connection
data.body: Working from home 10 hour days. With 2 kids can be pretty hard but with this cordless headset I can get up walk around and get things done and still be working. 10 out 10 recommend

data.title: Comfortable
data.body: This product has a comfortable headset truly adjustable microphone expansive and also fit smaller heads

data.title: All around great headset
data.body: The sound clarity is excellent and it‚Äôs the most comfortable headset I‚Äôve ever had and I‚Äôve had many in my twenty years working in a bank call center.

data.title: Great purchase
data.body:
I was going to buy a more expensive headset to work from home. But I decided to give this a try. I am pleasantly surprised!
The audio quality is great. Usually on cheaper headsets the microphone is terrible. But after asking some co-workers and listening to recordings, the mic is better than my $200 Plantronics and works as well as, or better than, any of my co-workers headsets.
It connects quickly and easily to my phone via Bluetooth and also to the included dongle to my Windows laptop.
My only disappointment is that can't connect to multiple devices at the same time or switch back and forth without disconnecting the previous.
But since this will just be used for my job, it's not a big deal for me.
Oh, and the noise cancelation works great too.
Highly recommended if you don't need multiple device connection.

data.title: Great for work
data.body: Bought this headset to use at home in my home office, it works great! It lets me stand up and walk if I need to during long calls without having to worry about cords.

data.title: Great headset
data.body: I work from home and have kids and pets and this headset saves me! It charges fast and it‚Äôs wireless! So I‚Äôm not glued to my desk. Also not huge and it‚Äôs lightweight!

data.title: Just what I needed for working from home!
data.body: I love this headset! It is comfortable and works great. It lasts a long time on charge. I work full time and have never run out of juice. The noise cancelling is amazing. It has great sound and all the patients I have to call everyday can always hear me clearly.

data.title: Good
data.body: Use everyday at work. Does hurt my ear by the end of the day. Headset adjusts but doesn't go as tight as I need and thus the non speaker side sits awkwardly on my head/ear. I move it around throughout the day because it annoys me. Sound and connection are good. I like that I can use the USB or connect via Bluetooth. I like that I can charge the headset on the stand or through a USBC cord. Overall good product but the too large fit is a bummer for me.

data.title: It really silence background noise!
data.body: Amazing amazing headset. It really has been helpful for me. I‚Äôm a licensed therapist and these headsets, help silent any background noise within home so that it does not lead to distractions. Also super helpful for meetings that I have to do. Great headsets!!!

data.title: Got this for dictation since I suck at typing and it's awesome!
data.body: I decided to start using dictation on my MacBook in order to help with my rapidly deteriorating typing skills. I had been looking at headsets that were 3x or more the price of this one but read the reviews on this product and decided to give it a try. I really do not like heavy headsets or heavy over-ear headphones on my head and this headset was the bomb. It fights well is super light weight and comfortable to wear all day long. The range is amazing too. I can leave my home office and go into the kitchen (which is not close) and not lose signal.The microphone picks up eveything i say very well. My favorite part happens to be the charging stand it comes with. The headset slides right on top and looks very high tech on my desk. I wrote this review dictating through my headset! There's no reason to pay super high prices for a good headset when this is just as good as the pricier ones. Definitely buy these.

data.title: Grateful for these headphones
data.body: I usually get headaches from wearing headphones for work but these have been a blessing so far. Very comfortable, no complaints yet of background noises! Great purchase.

data.title: Great
data.body: I got this for work. I love it. Haven‚Äôt had any issues with it and I‚Äôm able to move about the house while on calls.

data.title: Great Headset
data.body: This headset is very easy to set up and use. I use it to work from home, and needed the noise canceling aspect. I use it daily and have no complaints. I would definitely recommend to others. Great value for the price.

data.title: Very good headset!!!
data.body: This is a great headset, great for work and leisure. I love the fact that it's Bluetooth and I can connect it to my cell phone as well as my laptop. This is definitely a five-star product.

data.title: Great headphones
data.body: These headphones are great and have a long battery life. Perfect for working at home and not being stuck to your computer. Wide range, I can walk on the other side of my home and still be connected

data.title: Great purchase. Noise cancelation is excellent.
data.body: I purchased this headset to help, mostly, with my dog barking at all the Christmas amazon deliveries. It works great! I work from home and if I've by chance mentioned the noise in the back, people on the other end say they hear nothing. Also keeps a charge for a while. Very please with this purchase!

data.title: Great headset
data.body: This headset has been a great upgrade from my last. Sound on both ends is excellent, very comfortable, mic is easy to swing up and down. I have noticed once in awhile I have to unplug the USB connector and plug it back in for the headset to work but this may be an issue with my computer as my last headset had similar issues. It easily reconnects and I haven‚Äôt had any workability issues with the headset itself. Dock is easy and convenient.

data.title: Updated review
data.body:
I recently did a review and the battery wasn‚Äôt holding it charge and taking forever to charge when it did. They reached out to me to offer me a replacement and I took the replacement.

I have now updated my review based off the customer service. This one isn‚Äôt as bad as the first one but this one still takes forever to charge. I put it on the charger (connected to an outlet not computer) last night at 530pm, it is now 8 am and it‚Äôs still red, and won‚Äôt even turn on. I also get complaints about it cutting in n out at times BUT not as much as the first one.

You get what you pay for. Good thing I have a back up one that I‚Äôm able to use while this one charges for a day and a half before I can use it for 8 hours. Also when I‚Äôm on my 1 hour break I do put it back on the charger‚Ä¶.. so it‚Äôs not like I‚Äôm draining the battery. Would I buy again, no but if this is in your budget and you have a back up it‚Äôs comfortable enough to wear for 8 hours so that‚Äôs something

data.title: Excellent Purchase
data.body: Very happy with my wireless headset.... light weight.. great sound... awesome range.... extremely convenient to have the freedom to move around without losing a call

data.title: Work from home approved
data.body: I enjoy using these headphones my baby has been very vocal lately and this helps avoid customers hearing him! Good range too

data.title: Excellent Headset
data.body: This is a very good headset. It was very easy to set up and use. The noise canceling feature worked very well.

data.title: Great
data.body: I work from home and using the headset helps me to move throughout my house while talking to customers without interruption

data.title: Excellent for the price!
data.body: Love this. Have been using for work and they work great. Excellent for the price! Arrived quickly also!

data.title: New unit better. Not that great...
data.body:
Another update to my post. New unit works better. Customer service excellent. Will keep everyone posted if something changes.

I wanted to update my post and say the customer service is top notch! They are helping try and resolve my issue by sending a replacement unit. Not may places will do that. Will report back if the new unit fixes my issues.

Doesn't sit on the base to charge very well. Doesn't stay sunk up well. Have to disconnect the USB wireless connection to get the mic to work. Doesn't stay full charged very long. Not sure if I have a defective unit but the product doesn't work as advertised.

data.title: Headset freedom
data.body: This headset is perfect, lightweight, easy to install and allows for a long range of mobility

data.title: Voice quality is amazing
data.body: Love the freedom I have using the headset. The range is great and the battery life extends what I thought it would. I even bought 2 of them

data.title: Pretty good headset
data.body:
As someone who works in customer service and talk to alot of people,Compared to other headsets this one has worked for me.
Noise cancellation works.
So overall its a pretty decent headset
The only thing that could improve is that sometimes people cannot hear me like im on mute or they say i sound robotic so i have to reconnect it a couple of times a day

data.title: Very good quality
data.body: My wife uses it for work and says she loves the headset!

data.title: Completely satisfied
data.body: I was looking for a wireless headset that could support my duties required for work. This item does exactly what I need without requiring excessive charging. Perfect purchase!

data.title: Great headset!
data.body: I work from home with telecommunications and this is a great product to have!

data.title: Wireless Headset
data.body: I love headset . I us them for work telemarketing!

data.title: Great sound and mic
data.body:
The mute button speaks to say "mute on/mute off".
Hugs your head tightly.

The Great things about this headset are:
1. Great audio quality. I can hear callers very clearly.
2. The mic is great at noise cancelling background noise.
3. DEDICATED MUTE BUTTON.

data.title: Great noise canceling with easy to use Mute function.
data.body:
Pros
-Noise canceling works great.
-Easily accessible Mute button with notification that it has been activated/deactivated.
-Good Range- Inside and even outside.
-Battery Life
-Sound Quality
-Easily switch between Cellphone and my PC.

Cons
-Controls on the headset (except Mute) for Power/Volume/etc.. are not as easy to find and could have been designed better.

data.title: Great product
data.body: I ordered these headsets just a few weeks ago. They are amazing. I love the sound quality and they are very comfortable to wear.

data.title: Love the Noise Cancellation
data.body: Recently I bought the LEVN Bluetooth 5.0 Headset, Wireless Headset with Microphone, I absolutely love the sound quality and outstanding noise cancellation. The person on the other end cannot hear my dog barking :).

data.title: BEST WFH HEADSET EVER
data.body: I recently started working from home & needed a wireless headset as I now have a new born & can‚Äôt be restrained to my desk when he needs me. I am able to not only hop out of my chair to grab/tend to him but I can also mute the call right on my headset! So grateful I found this! I have shared it with all of my colleagues! üòçüôåüèºüíï

data.title: Great product
data.body: I like that you can walk away with it and still talk to someone up to a certain distance in the office! Great quality and the charge lasts long

data.title: I really like it with one sad exception
data.body: It's a good wireless headset. I use the dongle for the connection. It's a slightly muffled sound for both sides, but that's what you get with wireless--I got used to it in a day, it wasn't that bad. It looks modern and high tech on my desk compared to my old wired headset. The only downside, and I am trying to be serious, the voice that lets you know things like "power on" "power off" "pairing" "mute" etc., is a very depressed female voice. Not totally sure whether it's computer-generated. Poor thing. Maybe she didn't have a good day in the studio when doing the voiceover work! I would have preferred a neutral computer-generated voice. Now my work day ends with a sad, "power off."

data.title: Easy to use and compatible with my companys phone software

data.body: I ordered these headphones for work to be able to have more freedom to move around at work. They are comfortable and they stay connected and charged.

data.title: Hands free
data.body: This headset is perfect for the type of work that I do it‚Äôs crystal clear with conversations and people say that my mic is crystal clear talking to them. All around great stuff and even better on the price most other professional headsets are ridiculously priced close the the 250-300 range if your looking to save money this is the way to go.

data.title: Great Wireless Headphone!!!
data.body: This product is excellent! Noise-canceling is amazing. No more complaints from my manager. The battery lasts all day long. The connection is convenient, powered on, and instantly connects to my laptop/docking station without any issue. It‚Äôs pretty comfortable for a headset without pressure on my ear and head. I recommended it to my coworker, who is pleased with this headset. I am recommending this product to those who are looking for wireless headphones.

data.body: Works perfectly fine. Less expensive than most

data.title: Great Headset for a great price!has
data.body: This headset makes working from home so much better! It gives me freedom to move away from my desk while still being able to talk on the phone. I can hear very clearly on this headset and the person on the opposite end can also hear me very clearly. It also has a very far range. Loved it so much I ordered my husband one!
